SPX Innovation Hub

Turning science, technology, and enterprise ideas into practical, scalable development solutions across Africa. We support applied research, enterprise development, and digital innovation.

Applied Science Innovations
Pilots, field testing, and implementation research

We conduct hands-on experimentation and field research to develop practical solutions for agriculture, energy, climate, and circular economy.

Enterprise Incubation
Supporting ventures tackling systemic bottlenecks

We incubate and support early-stage businesses with training, prototyping resources, and market pathways to scale impact.

Digital Solutions
Dashboards, MEL tools, and digital systems

We develop digital agriculture tools, informational platforms, and market systems that support producers and enterprises.

6 innovations found

Spiral Innovation Club

Our platform for developing ideas that arise from Africa’s challenges.

Active

Microbial Solutions for Composting

Developing and testing beneficial bacteria that accelerate the conversion of coffee pulp and agricultural waste into nutrient-rich organic compost.

Coffee Training Institute

Innovation Challenges & Hackathons

Hosting sector-specific challenges to identify and support African-born solutions to local development bottlenecks.

National•2024
Governance

Skills & Sector Capacity

SPX runs a coffee training institute that supports coffee professionals build the skills needed for the global market. This initiative strengthens Ethiopia’s coffee sector by improving the knowledge needed for value addition and global competitiveness.

  • Roasting training
  • Sensory evaluation & cupping
  • Barista & hospitality skills
  • Quality grading & inspection

The Innovation Hub hosts and supports hackathons, sector dialogues, and community-based design processes to explore opportunities in key sectors.
